mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN split_part(sgg_nm, ' ', 3) <> '' THEN split_part(sgg_nm, ' ', 2) || ' ' || split_part(sgg_nm, ' ', 3) ELSE split_part(sgg_nm, ' ', 2) END as sgg_nm, sgg_cd FROM public.tl_sgg where substring(sgg_cd,1,2) like #{sdnm}

select ST_AsGeoJSON(ST_EXTENT(geom), 9, 1) from tl_bjd
AND bjd_cd = #{bjdlist}::varchar

select ST_AsGeoJSON(ST_EXTENT(geom), 9, 1) from tl_sgg
AND sgg_cd = #{sggnm}::varchar

select ST_AsGeoJSON(ST_EXTENT(geom), 9, 1) from tl_sd
AND sd_cd = #{sdnm}::varchar
SELECT round(avg("usageamt(kwh)"),2) as kwh from "TB_CARBON_A2" where usageym like #{chartdate} and "sgg_cd" || substring("bjd_cd",1,3) like #{bjdcd}
